notes: regular -are verb; used with auxiliary avere
example_sentence_english: I do not want to barely conceal the truth.
He is barely concealing his intentions.
The discontent was barely concealed.
The anger was barely concealed.
The facts were barely concealed.
The evidence was barely concealed.
I barely conceal my disappointment.
You barely conceal the truth.

translation_english: he barely conceals/she barely conceals/you (formal) barely conceal
example_sentence_english: You barely conceal your intentions.
We barely conceal the discomfort.
You barely conceal the nervousness.
They barely conceal the doubts.
I was barely concealing the fear.
You were barely concealing the sadness.

translation_english: he was barely concealing/she was barely concealing/you (formal) were barely concealing
example_sentence_english: You were barely concealing the anger.
We were barely concealing the tensions.
You were barely concealing the doubts.
They were barely concealing the bad mood.
I have barely concealed my annoyance.
You have barely concealed your emotions.

translation_english: he has barely concealed/she has barely concealed/you (formal) have barely concealed
notes: used with auxiliary avere; also used as formal Lei
example_sentence_english: He has barely concealed the news.
We have barely concealed the concern.
You have barely concealed the evidence.
They have barely concealed the facts.
